name: Education-related debt of doctorate recipients, by debt status and type: 2018
description: Education-related debt of doctorate recipients, by debt status and type: 2018

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: debt_status_and_type
variableMeasured.unitText: Number; mean and median debt in dollars

variableMeasured.name: number_reporting_debt
variableMeasured.unitText: Number; mean and median debt in dollars

variableMeasured.name: mean_debt_
variableMeasured.unitText: Number; mean and median debt in dollars

variableMeasured.name: median_debt_
variableMeasured.unitText: Number; mean and median debt in dollars

notes: There were 4,818 doctorate recipients who did not respond to the debt questions. Calculation of mean and median debt excludes doctorate recipients reporting no debt.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Earned Doctorates, 2018.
